resources.string: Developed by Aayush Kumaria\nDesigned by Ajinkya Rajkar
Welcome to the Beta Version of Dex Office Suite
In the Current version, you get a variety of products out of the box. Pun Intended
Don\'t feel like clicking around? No problem. Try our voice assistant to make everything easier
Oh. We forgot. We have dark mode too. Enable it in the settings. And now you\'re all set. Enjoy
Developed by Aayush Kumaria\nDesigned by Ajinkya Rajkar\nÂ© 2020

We in no way are capturing any user data be it the photos you scan, or the drawings you make.

We have kept your privacy as our number one priority and to prove this feel free to check the data used by the app in your settings.

No Data Usage = No Data Capturing ðŸ˜‰

The only way the app can access the photos you want to scan or perform OCR on, or the only way we can store those amazing drawing you drew is by asking for these permissions.\n\nThere is no other need for it we promise ðŸ˜‡

We have put so many features into this app to prevent you from jumping between two or more apps. And that means moving between the camera and us.

The only time the camera is used is when you want to capture an image directly onto the app.

Oh, and we do not store those images. Sorry ðŸ™ˆ

One of our unique features is our Voice Assistant we like to call 'Dexer' (Subject to change)

 For Dexer to hear your commands, the app would need audio permissions.

So feel free to speak your mind. We can't hear you ðŸŽ¤
We Aren\'t Fond of Back Buttons. Just Swipe Right
